Instructions

  • The game is played against the Computer.
  • Begin by positioning your ships on the board. Drag each ship from its first block or click on the random button for a random positioning.
  • You can rotate a ship by clicking on it if the move is legal. The rotation will only be applied if the move is allowed by the game rules.
  • Once all ships are positioned, confirm your setup to start the game.
